description:
Luffy sets his sights on the shadowing-stealing monster known as Gecko Moria, and the zombie army prepares for a night attack led by their perverted, invisible leader!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: His Name Is Moria! The Great Shadow-Seizing Pirate`s Trap!
Il s`appelle Moria ! Le piège du grand corsaire voleur d`ombres
Sono Na wa Moriah! Kage o Nigiru Dai Kaizoku no Wana
Его имя – Мориа! Ловушка великого пирата, забирающего тени
اسمه موريا! فخّ القرصان سارق الظّلال العظيم
その名はモリア! 影を握る大海賊の罠
